jd: Hello ProfessionalsHope you are doing well!!We have an immediate opening for the below position with one of our premium clients Title: Lead Java Integration JMS Developer Location: Houston, TX – Day 1 OnsiteDuration: Long term contractExp:12+years Must Have: Java IntegrationJava Messaging Services (JMS)Active MQMicroservices Design PatternsApache Ignite / Similar tool (Purpose: Grid / Distributed computing technologies.)Description: 10+ years Expertise in design and development of Java / J2EE microservicesHands-on experience on Integration design patterns and have end-to-end understanding on designing integration componentsDetailed experience as a Java Data Integration developer using message-oriented architecturesExperience with ActiveMQ and other messaging patternsData modelling and design capabilities.Strong experience in service-oriented architecture & transaction management systemsExtensive codebase design and development of large multi-tiered applications or systemsStrong experience of grid and/or distributed computing technologies (Apache Ignite)
